place_description:
The Percantile and Creamery is the premier Coffee, Ice Cream, and Dessert Bar in the Charlotte metro area. We are thrilling people with our amazing interior design, our incredible customer service, and the quality of our offerings. We have a beautifully designed 1920’s Mercantile-themed monochromatic throwback, where people feel excited by their surroundings, and blown away by their treats. Great for business meetings, families, couples, and you! Ask us about room rentals for meetings, events, or parties! Now offering catering.
Nestled next to Concord Mills Mall, behind Verizon, and in the same building as McAlister’s in Concord, NC!

reviews_data.review_text: I love visiting this coffee shop. It's got lots of seating and nice novelty items for sale outside of the coffee, bakery items and ice cream they sell. I've been visiting for years
Great little coffee and dessert shop. Staff is very friendly
Specialty drink flavors that you won't find elsewhere and a pastry lover's dream.

This place is amazing the atmosphere, and the customer service is top notch.  A bonus is the little chocolates and drinks are delicious and mouth watering. I live two hours away so I can't make this place an everyday stop like my local shop, but every time I stop in concord I'll be sure to stop here and you should too you won't be disappointed.

Ice cream is awesome and massive cone servings! Gourmet chocolates and yummy treats and pastries offered daily.

Excellent service and it's always super clean. Great coffee and work space indoor and outdoor options.

Sap sucker (hot coffee with orange and maple) with oat milk is incredibly good!

This sweet and beautiful server Armani gave us 10/10 service not only with timely delivery of our orders but also greeting us with a smile and having a delightful personality. 10/10 will be coming again!
Staff were super awesome , brownies are PERFECT, with the coffee ice cream  then a sugar cookie Sunday, with an espresso

We love this place, but Sunday we went to get ice cream and three ice cream buckets only had the dregs. Not sure why they had not been replaced. Two were flavors we wanted. Unfortunately we walked out.
Was in Concord for business and came across this gem. Lattes are a hit here and atmosphere/workers are upbeat and happy. Will be back next time I'm in Concord
The honey bee was absolutely delicious
Beautiful place! Very good for brunch, breakfast or just share time with friends!
Great selection of coffee and ice creams. Staff was very friendly, everything is very clean, and plenty of space to sit and relax and enjoy your coffee or treats.

The girl that works here was not welcoming at all. She just gave me my coffee in a plastic cup and said they don't have washed cups. After I asked I want it in ceramic cup she just poured my latte in cup and she just called my name n left.

Was amazed on how good the coffee was here! Plenty of specialty options! They have a good variety of Blue Bell ice cream with creative twists on how to eat them. Shakes, cones, dishes, sundaes and cookie sandwiches. Place was packed when we went and they were friendly and expededient. Plenty of parking.

Went in yesterday for coffee and got the calico...it was amazing! Grabbed the tuxedo mocha to take home. The grab and go drinks are an amazing idea. I'll probably stock up weekly to make the morning easier!
Estaba bueno el cafe, el mejor del area
Good options, great atmosphere. Went on a Saturday at around 4pm and they had already run out of some ice cream flavors. Got salted caramel and cookies & cream, both were excellent.

Coffee was great but on our first visit today we had  several issues. Wasn't open based on the hours of 7, opened shortly after 7. Mobile ordering doesn't work till 7:30 not 7. We wanted a waffle but they were out of those. Took over 20 minutes for 2 coffees and we were the first to order for the day. Staff was friendly but not a great first visit. It is very nice inside and for a local based store to have mobile ordering and a touch screen ordering inside was a nice touch.
Great coffee shop & ice cream place. Had coffee tonight. Plan to come back for ice cream or a sweet treat later.
Poor customer service.
This was one of the greatest experiences in my life. The host was terrific and the place was very convenient. I would definitely recommend anyone to come here.
Maybe an off day for them. They were out of everything we asked for as far as milkshakes. Even let us order only to come back and say they didn't have it.

Nice spot to get a little work done. I ordered an affogato and brownie that was very yummy; However, I was disappointed it came in a paper cup. Normally, when I sit down places, I like to find the locations that will actually serve with real cups. I won't hold this against the place thought because service was excellent (and it's hard anymore to find places that don't just use paper).
Amazing drinks. I like my things sweet so it was perfect!!
Very chill spot. Nice to just sit and talk or work on the computer. The service and employees were great
Awesome place! One of a kind in the area
I always love to explore local coffee shops and crafts store. Had their vanilla latte sadly it was too sweet to my taste. I'll try sth else next time. Good vibes though
Great staff, and great coffee!

The barista Sama rekindled my love for coffee with a phenomenal Sap Sucker craft latte! Their cake was a little stale and dry, but the cronut and waffle did not disappoint. The atmosphere is always warm and welcoming, and the staff are super friendly. Their collection of merch from local businesses has interesting finds, too!

Sama makes the chai just the way I like it. It's a really unique spot with a lot of local options; shirts, jams, hot sauces, and my wife's favorite - cronuts. I enjoyed the one time I was able to do karaoke as well!
Very good experience, greaat cappuccino! The customer service is great.
Such a phenomenal London Fog!!! Was able to work comfortably here, and love the ambiance. WiFi was fast and reliable. Will most definitely be back.
Cute little vibe!
Beautiful and elegant coffee shop with a calming atmosphere and great service!
Coffee is good, but only go if you want to waste 30 mins waiting for your cup of coffee.
Delightful and delicious
Mmmm so yummy. They also cleaned the red chairs - I love sitting on those!

Used to be much better. Med latte, med iced coffee & very tiny pastry $16. And absolutely no care given in presentation and delivery. No porcelain cup, No design poured, just mixed into paper cup and slammed out to customer. For that price and ZERO customer experience. We're done here. Other places popping up that show they actually care and care about your visit and offer a delightful atmosphere. Like Mattie Ruths. This place has gotten just plain apathetic and totally lost their unique niche. So sad. Good riddance.
Nice refuge from the Holiday traffic. Good coffee and treats. Comfortable seating. Fun place to meet friends.
Love the seasonal drinks and bee's knees latte. Have been here a few times and had good experiences except for my last time. The cashier was unwelcoming and the service was extremely slow
This is my FAVORITE coffee shop! The staff is always super friendly and I refuse to go anywhere else. Thank you guys for everything! <3

First time coming in with my daughter. Alex was very kind, helpful and professional. She provided recommendations and they were all a hit. Super sweet and would definitely be back for other recommendations that she provided!
Great ice cream, and even better service! This is The Finigan Groups go-to ice cream spot! We definitely recommend you check it out if you're in the area!

Really cute place great drinks, but to order an egg, cheese, and light on the mayo to only receive the bread and egg is disappointing  what happened to the cheese and mayo? I will continue to come for the coffee...

Update: thank you for making it right. We came in and everyone was so sweet perusal. Polite enough to remake the sandwich. You guys stop by and grab a coffee you'll not be disappointed with the service or the coffee. Thank you again for fixing what I know was just an honest mistake.

The coffee was not good. Staff did not know what a cortado was despite being on the menu and was given too large of a drink. The milk was burnt/over steamed and when I asked for an alternative milk, regular milk was still used and I ended up paying the price for it later...
The shop was clean and had a nice atmosphere.
Shoutout Amelia, she was great! Super friendly, even helped us make a video!
Worst coffee I have ever tasted. Save yourself; go to Starbucks.
Kate, Amelia, and Tina did fantastic!
Five star in every bucket!!

Last night my husband and I went for a dessert date after dinner. The atmosphere was very calm and vibrant with lots of couples and families.  We were so glad that they were open.  I enjoyed the best Green tea Matcha latte made by Sama.  She was so kind and generous.  She was able to customize it by adding mint flavor.  I spoke to her at the end of the night and complimented the tea.  I mentioned how much for a refill, and she bless my heart and gave up her complementary shift drink. She truly was such a blessing.   It is always nice to meet kind, hard-working, workers, at coffee shops, who love their job.   Hats off to the kind young man who worked at the register last night because he was so very patient as we were trying to figure out our order. Love this place!

I had a cappuccino and a cronut. The cronut was really good! Light, airy, and fluffy. The cappuccino was also food. Not amazing but would go again if I needed a solid one. Staff was friendly and nice but took a bit longer than I thought it would given they weren't very busy.
I got the honey and cinnamon latte and a scoop of oatmeal ice cream. It was soooooooo good. The cashier was super friendly and nice. The atmosphere was perfect for getting some school work done

What a great experience at The Percantile and Creamery! The atmosphere is cozy, and the service was friendly and welcoming. I ordered a cappuccino, but I received a shot of espresso instead. Not a big deal, though, the waffle sundae more than made up for it! It was absolutely delicious--crispy, warm, and topped with just the right amount of sweetness. My wife really enjoyed her latte, which was perfectly balanced, and my son had a blast with the brownie sundae. He couldn't stop raving about it! Overall, the desserts were the highlight of our visit. Definitely recommend this place if you're in the area! We'll be back for sure the next time we are through the area.
The slowwwwwest experience I've ever had.  Over 15 mins for a cortado

Replying to the percentile .
I came by at least 4-5 more times after my review and it kept getting worse and worse . I finally messaged you guys and complained and questioned the barista , and was told in store and on Instagram that you guys use a CONCENTRATE AND HAVE ALWAYS USED A CONCENTRATE .  Making it seem like i was wrong and crazy . In this reply you mentioned beans . You guys lied . Someone lied to me ... you never use to use a concentrate because I watched you make my drink . Now it's all white , and sweet . Disgustingly sweet . I'm confused . Was the owner trying to make excuse for the baristas ? Or were you trying something new ? I use to buy the beans you used with the drinks !  Something isn't right ... just like the concentrate they put in my drink !

love percentile , but first time in 6-7 years , the berries didn't taste like the berries . We drove over an hour for you guys ... I can't give you guys a bad rating , but I hope quality doesn't change . Baristas have always been consistent. ALWAYS .

Don't come looking for dessert. This is a cofee ship. Despite the looks of the desserts the cakes we tried were dry and the frosting is hard like sugar candies you put on a birthday cake. Service was cool.

This has to be one of the most consistent coffee shops in the Charlotte/Concord area. Over the last 6 years, I have NEVER had a bad drink here! If you're ever near Concord Mills, check this place out!
Nice place. Really wish there was pictures and descriptions of the drinks on the video order kiosk instead of the same stock picture of a latte cause I had no idea what half of the stuff was.
Great coffee and great ice cream. Nice place to meet up and chat or do some work/study.

Extremely slow service and the coffee is not worth the wait. Four people were working but it was painful to watch. After opening the food we ordered I edited my review to 2 stars.  Waited 20 minutes for a dry croissant with a tiny portion of chicken salad. What a waste of time and money.

I have been coming here since I moved to concord for the time experienced such poor service. They were all standing around chatting then to service a customer. Not the service I have received since I I have been coming here. The girl was rude.. Not coming back as I value service and experience.
Oliver was the best!!

Absolutely love this coffee shop. Great place to come to do some work.

Staff is super friendly, it was my go to when we used to live nearby and the pricing is really decent for the quality.

It's the first coffee shop to make my husband actually like coffee, his favorite is the Gourdy.

Highly recommend!

High marks for the efficient service, and cleanliness of the place.
I wasn't wowed by my very bland latte, and my bland turkey egg and cheese on a croissant. They don't use real eggs for the sandwich, it's that egg in a can stuff. You can taste it immediately.
This place won't replace Rocky River Coffee company  and Verb as my favorite coffee shops in the area.
Very cozy shop with great coffee selections and yummy blue bell ice cream (TEXAS!!! ) staff is very friendly, would recommend!
This was a great place for coffee and to recover from the crowds of Concord Mills
I attended the first Ambient Music event there on 9/12. I had an iced decaf latte that was so robust that I couldn't believe that it was decaf. The staff were incredibly friendly.
Highly recommend the Firecracker Mocha!
Sandwich delicious
I loved it

So I came in Monday on my birthday and Sam had already knew it was my birthday and had my drink already started. This place is such a unique experience with such amazing baristas and really is the best coffee in the city!

Cute coffee shop with lots of places to sit. They offer coffee, other drinks, and some food options.  4 stars as the women's bathroom needs a deep cleaning, and when I approached the counter to order, the team member behind the counter didn't greet me/say hello. This was my first time here, and I was unaware that you order and pay on their tablet. Great idea, but execution could be better. The team should still be friendly.
The very best chai latte I've had anywhere local... Definitely better than Starbucks or SunFlour. Wonderful baristas and plenty of seating!

Great place! Love the decor and the coffee was top notch. Love the fact that they allow well behaved dogs and even offer them a treat

**Update** this place is not dog friendly? I took my dog again to buy coffee but they did not allow him inside the second go around. I don't understand when they literally give dogs puppachinos and I've seen dogs inside the establishment. Okay? Please show some consistency with your policies. I did not mean to get angry with the young employee at the register but I do not like to pulled around.

I went here this morning and was greeted with a smile and helpful customer service! The worker Kaylyn helped me pick a drink I would enjoy. I ended up trying the raspberry and white chocolate latte, and really enjoyed it. Definitely will be returning.
Kate turner is an exceptional server
Kate Turner was our server and she was so kinda and respectful!!!
Amazing
I practically live here...I work at a neighboring business and always recommend The Perk to my own customers as well, not only for the coffee, but the staff are top notch!
I had breakfast at Percantile and Creamery yesterday, and I loved everything about it! The atmosphere, service, and food all deserve a 5-star rating from me. I'll definitely be back!

Sammy is the best!!!! Every week she creates a new coffee flavor to surprise me and it's getting harder to decide which one I like best. And if I enjoy it with a strawberry Cronut... my day is just perfect! Thank you so much for keep the quality and good service!
Good environment and service, but lattes are subpar.
Small selection of ice cream and pastries, brownies are to sweet.

I've been a regular at this coffee/ice cream shop for months, and it truly is my favorite spot in town! Initially, I used to come here alone, but now I bring everyone along - my coworkers, mall management, my roommate, friends, and even my boyfriend. I visit multiple times a day, and I have no regrets!

The atmosphere here is amazing, and the place is always spotlessly clean. The baristas and owners are some of the friendliest and sweetest people you'll ever meet. They make everyone feel welcome and part of the community.

I've even made some wonderful friends here, with Abby being one of the best. The strong AC and Wi-Fi make it a perfect place to hang out, work, or just relax. The other regulars are also fantastic and add to the welcoming vibe of the place.

One of the highlights is their summer menu, which features a latte that has become my all-time favorite. I honestly can't get enough of it - if it's not coffee from here, I don't want it!

They host a variety of events like bingo nights, karaoke nights, classes, and there's an upcoming trivia night that I can't wait to check out. Their Instagram content is hilarious and keeps me entertained between visits.

I've even started collecting their merchandise - so far, I have a t-shirt and a mug, but I'm definitely planning to get more.

This place is also great for groups. Sometimes I come alone, but other times I host a small Bible study here, and it's always the perfect setting.

If you're looking for a fantastic coffee/ice cream shop with a welcoming atmosphere, friendly staff, great events, and a wonderful community, this is the place to be. Highly recommend!
I went in here with my family and it was such a cool experience. Abby checked us out and she was very outgoing and kind when helping us through a rush. I will be back! Coffee was amazing

My family and I have been coming since they've opened. They have become a part of my extended family in a way! My favorite drink is an iced white chocolate mocha and cinnamon but all of the options will rock your world! All of the staff is amazing, especially Olivia! She always has a smile on her face and rocks it out during a rush!

Bingo nights have been a blast to attend, I'm a huge fan of the seasonal drinks they offer. The pastries are heavenly especially the cake and truffles! Bailey, Olivia, and Sam have been extremely helpful either with recommendations, customer service, and communication with customers. I highly recommend this establishment!
I got the best service from Baylie while I was in town, was literally the hardest worker there was in there
I got a nimbus latte the other day and all of the staff were very kind. Especially Bailey who was super helpful in giving me a suggestion when I didn't know what I wanted.
Charlotte was very gorgeous to me !!!!

Great service I feel like the large kiosks take away from the customers experience with the staff but it's understandable for such a high volume location. The espresso has a bitter with a honey burnt aftertaste  that getting the honey was a lot. Coming from coffee there is a difference between the body and adding syrups ! Overall awesome staff very attentive to helping guest will be back !
Great experience last visit.  Friends staff and generous portions.  Thanks.
The BEST coffee and super friendly staff!
Went to get ice cream.  Probably the smallest  most pathetic single scoop of ice cream I have ever had.  Very dissatisfied and not sure I will ever return.
Great place! Kind & attentive staff and the lattes are wonderful.
Came in early morning and the workers were super sweet! Totally recommend the cranberry orange muffins and the bee's knees latte!

Overall I went there right at perfect timing before it got too crowded, And the ice cream was pretty good and all the desserts looked pretty good. The ice cream was especially really good since I went there with my mom and she almost never gets two scoops of ice cream but she couldn't decide so she got two scoops of ice cream. And she's a health nut so it was so good that I health nut got seconds

My too go when I have a sweet tooth, or a treat yo self moment.
I love bingo night! Great and calm atmosphere  the young lady I never catch her name is always a doll

Went in to see if they sold macaroons. There was a short line. This was our first visit there. I don't like to assume but it felt like we were ignored because of our skin color. We were standing there for quite sometime after the guy in front of us was waited on. The staff walked past the counter several times without any acknowledgement what so ever. There were 3 staff behind the counter. After we stood there for a good while, enough to realize they weren't gonna wait on us, I said excuse me, the girl turned around and said "yeah?". So rude. She wasn't very helpful at all. She replied with a sarcastic response. I felt upset and not appreciated or valued as a customer in their establishment. Will not be back, which is a shame because it looks like they sell some pretty great stuff, but based on how I was treated, I don't plan on finding out.
I have been a regular for a couple months now and love it! Wonderful staff and a fun atmosphere.
10/10 the coffee the ice cream the treats, simply amazing

This wonderful coffee shop serves delicious ice cream and pastries, too! Prices are reasonable and what you would expect. Service was impeccable! Lots of parking is available just a few feet from the door. Enjoy!
Good ice cream, good coffee, and good service with a smile. I do like this place a lot. The wall art is pretty neat as well.
Great little find this morning as I needed a good cup of coffee. They made a terrific recommendation with the creme brulee latte and it was refreshing! Highly recommend and I will be back.

It's near my home and was a delight to visit. The staff is friendly and willing to offer samples if you're not too sure of which flavor ice cream or coffee you'd like to try.  I would suggest getting there early afternoon as their items are not stocked.  So when they're gone, they're gone for the day. I have been going here off and on for several years. I used to enjoy visiting.
It has gone a little downhill. Tables are wobbly, they're very understaffed, and tables are not wiped up. They've added a kiosk for ordering, but it doesn't help much if they have a large menu and only 2 to 3 people behind the counter. I love supporting local businesses, but I'm a little disappointed to know that it's now lacking the charm it once had.

I've always come to this coffee shop. So today I tried out their kiosk. Apparently the instructions I left for a drink were confusing, so instead of asking for clarification they made the drink. That isn't the issue, the individual with the pink hair was extremely condescending when explaining what an Americano was to me and my mother. I don't think 'fill half the cup with water' is confusing. When I tried to explain to them that they can just empty half the cup and put another shot in they exclaimed to be very confused as if I was speaking another language. I especially did not appreciate watching how they interacted with other customers (very kindly) and comparing it to their interaction with my mother and I. I've always enjoyed coming to this establishment, it's a shame that I don't want to come here anymore now.
Good ambiance.

I reserved the private area for an intimate gathering. Olivia was INCREDIBLE! She was attentive, patient, and very friendly. She was a God-send! The owner stopped by to say hello. I thought that was a kind gesture. The pastries were out of this world! They were fresh and melted in my mouth. We thoroughly enjoyed having our meeting at The Percantile and Creamery. If you are looking for a quaint, intimate, friendly place with yummy treats to have your next meeting or to connect with friends and family, do not hesitate to give them a try!
Little cakes were yummy, coffee good and ice cream! Very cute inside!

Barista named Olivia is one of the sweetest, genuine employees I've experienced in awhile. She gave this place a well deserved mention. Thank you making our coffee treat this morning a memorable experience.
Excellent service, treats, and atmosphere!  Kate was particularly helpful during this visit. The shop and bathrooms are always clean and it's so close to the mall!
The staff is amazing! Always so kind and quick with service. Totally recommend!

This has been my go-to coffee place for around 5-6 years now. Still love it! I used to come here for study sessions in high school and now I come at least once a month on dates with my wife when we're in the area! The baristas are fantastic; I had a great time with Sam specifically when I visited this past weekend. So helpful and friendly! Also, try the holiday cookie latte if you're ever here during Christmas time!!! It's the best!

Great staff and coffee.
Best place for quality time!

This place is exactly how cute coffee shops should look. It's spacious with lots of seating, cute couches, and a ton of options to choose from. However, it took forever to get my order, which was just a brownie with ice cream. Took abt 15mins. And then, the ice cream was subpar in taste and I really wanted the brownie to be warm. That might've helped it taste a bit better. It wasn't horrible, but I had higher expectations for this beautiful shop.
Self checkout only that does not work work employees look and ignore until there is a line. Would not recommend.
Love this place! Nice help, always friendly.

Quality coffee created with care. They have an amazing selection of coffees and options for your coffee. Types of milk, ice level as well as other options like an extra shot of espresso or some honey. This is also true of the sandwiches, you can truly build your own drink and sandwich. They have this for tea as well. I was very impressed by the many options. The quality is amazing and their baked goods are delicious. Next time I am in town I will be stopping in again.
It was my first time here and Olivia, the barista, was so sweet and made me feel so welcome. The coffee is delicious and Sam did an amazing job in the kitchen. I will definitely be coming back
The creme brulee latte was one of the best coffees I've ever had!
My top coffee spot in Concord to date. They have a great speciality coffee menu. I got a violet and chocolate latte with oat milk. Delicious. Also got the ice cream. The service is great also.

I have a long, speckled history with this coffeeshop, but it's survived both good and bad.
First thing's first, the coffee is consistently great, especially when Grayson is on bar - she's by far my favorite barista in the area, and she brings both hospitality and expertise to the coffeeshop. Perc also offers Jags Head, and while I don't prefer their proprietary blend, I LOVE the coffee from their Finca el Cipres farm; it's one of my favorite roasts available in the Charlotte area. Furthermore, Perc offers excellent traditional espresso drinks as well as deliciously creative crafts, even letting the baristas have a say in creations.

However, there are still some qualms I have with the shop. Most notably, I wish the owner would focus more of his energy on doing coffee EXTREMELY well; I don't understand the eclectic assortment of random goods spews across the shop, and I doubt it turns enough of a profit to warrant the space it takes up. No one comes to perc for soap, pasta, popcorn, or lotion, so quit pouring resources into those things. I get it: Sean wants to support local businesses, and I do too! But support local businesses that are in/complimenting your industry. The daily pastries and truffles are great.

Ultimately, there's a reason I come back every once in a while. The owner knows what he's doing, but he'd still benefit from sitting down and acting upon what his staff and loyal customer base have to say.
Great place to sit and study and the cake and ice cream is a added bonus right now they have some delicious kronut flavors

This is one of the best ice cream places in Charlotte, Nc! The ice cream was soooo good! and it was the first time I tried red velvet ice cream, and that's the best red velvet ice cream I have tried, I went with my mom and siblings, and we are so happy we chose to go, the service also a 10/10!!!
Great spot for delicious coffee, pastries and a chill atmosphere. I had the Tuxedo Mocha this time around and of course it was great. I definitely recommend The Percantile!!
Pretty good selection of delicious ice cream flavors. Lots of options for coffees and sundaes. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Nice ice cream and good work space.
Coffee icecream with pecans is soo good and like the ambience.

This is one of the few rare places I give 5 stars all around to. The service was above and beyond what I expect from most places. I'm not sure what her name was, but I went to have some icecream with my mother and and we both agreed the clerk was very attentive, kind and sweet.

The atmosphere was very cool, and had a chic modern cafe feel with 1920's decor. It felt cozy and to top it off, the ice cream brownie sundae we had was absolutely incredible. This place hit all the marks. I didn't realize such a great place was so close to my home. I'll definitely be back
What a cool little place. Drink was fantastic, exactly what I needed.
Yum
The atmosphere and service was great. Interesting coffee menu however the icecreams were a tad too sweet.
My favorite coffee shop in the area by far. Including Charlotte. They have delicious pastries and coffee. My personal favorite is the cherry cordial latte
Great coffee!  Best around for sure.

So that you guys know and understand, I can't consume coffee because it makes me tremble  most of the menu is based on coffee but in the special menu for spring time there was a drink with matcha so  I didn't want to be a pain in the a**  but I asked if there was a possibility of replacing coffee for mate in one of the drinks on the menu (because certainly the combinations looked amazing), the cashier and barista with a lot of sweetness said that there was no problem and that she would do it for me 

My boyfriend ordered a mint and chocolate and mocha-fudge-almond ice cream that he entirely adore! Besides, I also ordered a cinnamon roll that tasted very homemade and of course delicious  but what I liked the most was my matcha latte with white chocolate and lavender, it's one of THE BEST matchas I've ever taken, you can tell that they did it with a lot of love 

The place is beautifully decorated not only with chairs but armchairs and a cool couch, they have other drink options ready to go and merchandise such as mugs, hoodies and very nice shirts 

Very good sanitation score, good variety on the menu and super attentive, kind and extremely friendly staff 

Very very recommended
Great place to take the family for ice cream very sweet staff and welcoming. Ice cream is delicious.
Great Ice Cream . The Purple Nose is a must try !!!
Good coffee
Great date night with the lady of my life
Absolutely adorable little dessert spot!! We will be back every time we're in town!!!
Nice place with excellent service. Good pastries and coffee.

It was ok. Bit slow, and overcrowded. My iced latte tasted pretty good but my husbands hot latte they he got tasted absolutely vile, I'm not quite sure what happened to make it taste so bad, we had to throw it away.

2 people for a full coffee shop? On a long weekend ? Sales, projections, and staffing aren't mathing, my friend! It's not the 2 ppl u have in here because they're doing their best, its your own management scheduling issues. Not happy about it.
My favorite place to get a cup of coffee and work on my novels

Fantastic little place that I discovered recently, and have been going there to work away from the office and have client meetings when appropriate as well. Great coffee, delicious bakery options, solid Wi-Fi, and just genuinely nice people!
Really nice coffee shop, very good selection!
They aren't the quickest, but they're all very nice and seem to care about their job. The coffee is quite tasty and the pastries are ridiculously decadent.
Delicious. Love the tuxedo mocha!

Percantile is still one of my favorite coffee shops because their coffee is sooo good BUT the wait time for simple items need to improve. Waited 35 minutes for a bagel and a waffle and coffee was already finished by the time we got our food. Barista did explain they had a few sandwiches in front of us when we asked but it shouldn't take that long to simply warm something up. I ordered at 10:07, got my food at 10:43.
Nice atmosphere
Wonderful spot to curb your sweet tooth, croinuts are wonderful as are the truffles.
The cronuts, the coffee, and the tea drinks were divine.  I will be back!
Very slow service.  The order was messed up, and we did not receive what we ordered because it was given to someone else.  The coffee is okay. We won't be back.
Great service, great atmosphere, amazing coffee!

I went here for the first time and tried the Holiday Cookie as well as got an affogato. Both were delicious, but the service was truly amazing. I have a special needs kiddo who cannot yet eat by mouth (he's allowed a few tastes), and the server was so kind to allow me two small tasting spoons to allow him to try two new kinds of ice cream on his birthday. She even offered him a coloring page and sticker. This was the best experience we have had in a while!
Great lattes, very creative too. My favorite is the Bearcat.
Wow. This is our new favorite place!

A really cute and cozy coffee shop with great coffee and baked goods. I've never tried the ice cream but it looks great. Only comment is that there are very few healthy breakfast options here but you can get a yoghurt if that's your vibes
Coffee and food were good. Not a lot of gluten free options.
I enjoyed coming here.  The ordering experience was simple and fast with the electronic kiosk.  The place was nice and cozy with plenty of variable seating.  The staff was friendly and attentive.

Date visited - November 25 2023
Ordered Tuxedo Mocha and The Nimbus

Not sure if I am more impressed with the order or the demeanor of the staff. Our experience was bloody awesome. The staff were kind and friendly and both coffees were mindblowing. We will definitely return to try the other coffee flavors here.
Great place for a casual meeting place. Ice cream was delicious!!!!
This is an awesome place to just sit and study.

Absolutely love it here!! A hidden gem in the Concord Mills area. The staff here went above and beyond to help me make my coffee just how I like it. They are so kind and do a fantastic job! The whole place is so clean and usually quiet even while busy. Breakfast sandwiches are delicious as well. Definitely pay this place a visit!!!
Great coffee selection.
Very nice coffee shop
When I want a good coffee and dessert. This is my meetup place. Very clean, food/drinks good and service great.
My fav place
My coffee drink was good and the carrot cake was awesome. It's a nice little cafe.

I am a firm believer that one bad employee can make or break a business... thankfully, ALL the employees at this establishment are amazing! Everyone here serves you as if they're welcoming you into their home. The staff is friendly, vibrant, and quick! On top of their stellar service, the coffee and food here is delightful. Everything tastes fresh and yummy! Keep up the amazing work you all!!!

P.S., the red-haired king (Idk his name) is AWESOME. He is very kewl! That man makes the absolute BEST coffees! Also, Olivia is such a sweet soul! Her customer service is top tier!

I am a firm believer  that one bad employee will cost your revenue!
You can have a ton of great employees with great customer service, but the one employee who needs to be far away from customers will send money out the door due to lack of customer service skills..
I have a ton of business meetings here, but I am starting to reconsider!
It's not all employees, but when you walk away from a customer you are actively engaging in due to "break time," that is so unacceptable. Finish assisting, then take the break!

Honestly, this is my favorite coffee shop in Concord. The staff is so kind and tells you what drinks are their favorites. The coffee is always good, and so is the food. A great place to study and get some work done. Definitely a great place to stop if you are in the area.

Excellent coffee. I recently moved back to Charlotte after graduating college and I've had issues finding a solid latte. I had the Firecracker (Spicy mocha) latte and it was fantastic. The staff was very friendly, the wifi was good, and there was plenty of seating. Great place to come and get work done!
This is a great place for get togethers. My daughter's club meets here weekly, and it always has others working, chatting and enjoying a general coffee house vibe... And it has ice cream
The best Carrot cake
I usually use this spot as a place to study. It has a nice ambiance and good breakfast items!

Absolutely love this cozy little spot. Ot can get pretty busy, but most of the time, it's a nice place to read or take a meeting.  They do run out of icecream flavors from time to time, but that's how you know your getting good stuff.

The flavored seasonal coffees are so rich, it's sinful. Can't really share what I got last because the menu always changes.  So I'm always eager to try something new.

Summertime is the best because that's when they add the super milkshakes to the menu. And OMG.... it's everything in a glass!

They also have pastries and bon bons, which are .
Amazing coffee and Chai Tea and the best ice cream and pastries too
absolutely love this place!

$12 + for 2 lattes.
Too much
Great spot for coffee & date, or even to read a book with your coffee
I came in for a simple ice cream cone for dessert, and I got the cherry blossom on a waffle cone, and it was so delicious. I wanted to come back for seconds! I definitely will be back
I love the Perc and so do all of my friends. I come like everyday and sometimes twice. The people, lovely. The drinks, amazing. The food, delicious. A pleasant experience!

Nice ice cream and coffee shop. Great lattes and truffles with excellent staff this afternoon. Only improvement: Please make it more obvious to coffee patrons that they don't need to stand in the ice cream line.
Great place for icecream. Good ambience. Great service. This is our go to place for icecream and shakes. Their peach icecream is amazing.
Great Ice Cream and Chai and coffee.
The food was good and they had great service! The atmosphere is also very calming.
Best coffee! It tastes the same every time. Consistent with the taste. Amazing staff

Love this place!! Have been going here since they opened and they just keep improving. Great coffee options. You can customize fairly easy. And let's not forget the ambience...super cozy, perfect spot to read...though probably not during their peak hours, cause it gets noisy.

I will definitely be back. This is such a sweet spot. I tried a caramel brownie with Almond coffee ice cream and it did not disappoint. The vibe is great, I love the location and it's beautiful and clean. I just really felt this was worth the drive! I'll be back woth a friend and I want to purchase the loose leaf tea next time!
This is also a great place to study and I love the bees knees latte 
I look forward to trying out my new Sweet Potatoe butter!

I have been looking for a place that does good iced vanilla latte's with sugar-free vanilla since I've moved out here and they've all been terrible... until now. I waited a little longer than I would've liked, but it's understandable to hot Saturday so this place was packed, and rightfully so! This coffee was amazing and I would wait for it again if I had to!
I can't complement this place enough. Beautiful place, beautiful staff, lovely atmosphere, and delicious coffee. It's my go for cafe whenever I want to rest or work. A great family place too!

Staff was very friendly, drinks were delicious. Got our drinks to go and realized after we were halfway home that our drinks aren't sized properly. 3oz isn't a big deal but it was a little disappointing.
Creme brulee latte was amazing and our other two seasonal drinks were good.
We got the Jack Daniel's Chocolate and that was good but definitely not great for people with sensitive teeth (like my girlfriend lol) and the Calico brownie which was also very yummy.

My visit to The Percantile and Creamery was an absolute delight. Despite being new, the lady at the counter was incredibly engaging and friendly, leaving a lasting positive impression on us. Even my niece couldn't help but comment, "I like her, she's is sweet!" Her outstanding service elevated our experience.

We indulged in an array of treats, including the brownie with ice cream, Triple chocolate cake, Chocolate Truffle and Strawberry ice cream cone. Each bite was a symphony of flavors and pure enjoyment. While we didn't have a chance to try the coffee on this visit, the overall quality of the offerings leaves us eagerly anticipating our next visit.

The combination of exceptional service, delectable treats, and the charming atmosphere at The Percantile and Creamery make it a must-visit.

Had to ask for pricing on drink items, don't love that but I guess their prices are typical of other coffee spots. Was told they had to keep changing prices so they removed them. Employees we're happy to help. A lot of seating.
I love this place. My kids love to brownie with ice cream for a breakfast.

Very nice space. My girlfriend got the Blueberry Pie latte and loved it; I got the Banana Mocha and, while it was alright for a mocha, it was a bit disappointing with the lack of banana flavor. I will definitely be back to try the other drinks though.
It's always a pleasure dropping in for an Oat Milk Dark Chocolate Mocha with Strawberry Latte and truffles! Never have we walked out of here with a bad cup of coffee of treat...see y'all again soon!

The coffee hear is consistently excellent. The staff is very friendly and the decor has a very calm yet elegant look and feel. It's definitely not your typical tiny little coffee house or big corporate coffee. Highly recommended.
And yes they also have some of the best ice cream.

2/5 for their coffee, 4/5 for their service, and 5/5 for the atmosphere.

We got the Bearcat and the Cherry Corndial. The Bearcat was a little too much cardamom, and the Cherry Corndial was just too much cocoa powder, and nothing to write home about. The coffee order itself took 10-15 minutes.

They've ice creams, and other sweet items as well. They've restrooms in the back.

We were expecting so much from this place but left disappointed. It's located in a strip mall in Concord just outside of Charlotte.
Very good
Love coming here for lattes!
Very chill coffee joint.  Got a milkshake and it was fantastic.  Great service too.
One of the best coffees I've ever had. So many delicious flavors!

The vanilla almond loose leaf tea  was so yummy! It was also a wonderful  place to people watch as families and people came and went as I relaxed in a cozy chair with my tea after pilates and picking up wild bird seed!  Perfect start to get my Saturday off just right!

This is a great meeting place as they serve coffee and other treats. It's much larger than most coffee shops though I do personally prefer other coffee brands. My kids love meeting up with their friends and getting ice cream too. I only wish there were more comfortable seating options as the chairs are pretty hard (metal) and the sealant from the tables may need to be redone. The best part about this place in addition to the size however are the friendly workers. We're always greeted and feel welcomed.

We ordered 2 coffee's and 3 breakfast things. 2 sandwiches and an apple turnover. The apple turnover was good..

The bagel and croissant sandwiches were SO BAD. Like worse than fast food. Bagel was a rude imitation of a bagel. The croissant was the worst one ive had in my life, wasn't even marginally flakey. The sausage was so flavorless and the eggs are better at McDonald's (so that's saying something).

Do not recommend, but in NC y'all clearly don't care about breakfast cafes or good places to eat so I guess that's why it's rated so highly. I'm from Philly, this would close within the year...
Always have an amazing experience when I visit.

Got the banana mocha and the tuxedo mocha both were so good. Tried the croissant as well definitely worth it. The service was superb! Plenty of parking out front, shop has a great atmosphere as well! Definitely will be coming back.
My favorite place
I don't know of anything that could be improved
Very nice cashiers and our orders were yummy. The vibes in the place are really nice. We tried the iced and hot mocha latte and both are good.
I love the place but today I went to buy my ice cream and before 8:30 pm they were already putting away the ice creams and they were only offering a few flavors. It's supposed to close at 9 pm.

This is a must! First time here, I just stop by with my family for an icecream and it was awesome! My 3 years old is sooo polite and they were wonderful with her! I love the space, decoration, People, staff, icecream and everything! We'll be back!
My new local cafe and ice cream spot. Great desserts and drinks. I've not tried any of the savories yet, but everything I've had has been lovely. The seasonal drinks are tasty and always interesting.
Staff is so nice and super fast. I really enjoyed my coffee at the place.
Very welcoming place! I love that the prices are good and the food/drinks are of quality!
It was  good to try but not outstanding ice cream. The staff is nice and the area is clean.

If service was allowed 10 stars that's what I'd give it, five isn't enough! I visited today with my elderly aunt who has Parkinson's and my very active 6 year old on 6/6/2023 around 4pm-ish. I wish I would have caught her name but the young lady who helped us delivered premium service! She was so patient and so kind. She allowed me to get my daughter and aunt situated before I went back to choose and pay for my items. She answered every question I had and then some.

We loved the ice cream! My aunt is an ice cream connoisseur and worked at our local creamery back home for years. She was very impressed!

I brought home a couple apple pie cronuts for my mom and husband and they devoured those as well. My mom said the best part was pulling the flakey layers at each bite!

This was such a fantastic experience! Percantile and Creamery you have certainly set the bar high for your competitors!
A great place to get some dessert and hang out.  Plenty of seating and friendly staff. The ice cream and brownies tasted great!
Friendly service. Lots of space between seating areas. Drinks and food were delicious. Will definitely return.

Delicious! We will absolutely go back next time we are in the area. We aren't typically flavored coffee people, but their options were delightful and did not overpower the flavor of the lattes themselves!

Drove over for the croissant but sold out. My sweet African American lady help me pick ice cream and she "apologized " for the croissant being sold out which never was her fault.  I love her smile and her beautiful teeth, it made my day.
I had an amazing Affoggato with Tillamook ice cream and amazing espresso!

Wonderful find for coffee and treats! The ambiance is relaxed and the staff is friendly. I tried the Coconut latte cold and it was delicious! The perfect pick me up with a hint of coconut, caramel and sweet.
The drinks are phenomenal! My new favorite coffee spot!

This cafe has the best and elaborate latte menu. It's a delight for any coffee aficionado. I've been here several times and tried most of their lattes. The latte with cayenne pepper is my favorite.

I didn't like their baked goods though. But will definitely revisit for the best coffee in town!
Followus@johncauble via Facebook

Great little local coffee shop! I love meeting people here because of the great service and relaxed atmosphere. Coffee drinks are always consistent and delicious. Love the accompanying ham and egg breakfast croissant! They also serve up amazing homemade pastries, muffins, and sweets! Did I mention the assorted flavors of Tillamook ice cream?! Indoor and outdoor seating makes this my local go to.
Beautiful and elegant

My husband and I have stopped here a few times for dessert recently.

We really enjoy getting ice cream on top of a waffle. Make sure to ask for the waffle to be warmed up. Our favorite flavor so far was the White Chocolate Raspberry ice cream. They don't make their own ice cream, but Tillamook is pretty good.

The service is usually a bit slow, but I don't mind waiting. The only real problem we've had is that the last time we went, we sat outside on their patio (like we had the previous times). They give you a number and bring your order to you. On this occasion, we waited quite a while, so we went inside to check on it.

Upon doing so, they told us they didn't know where we were, so they didn't bring the food. They then handed us a cold waffle with completely melted ice cream. This wasn't ideal to me since we were sitting on their patio, but I guess we'll just wait for our food inside from now on.
Great service and great coffee.

Ordered a cappuccino with vanilla and oatmilk. I got neither, just straight espresso
I have never been anywhere I couldn't get an iced espresso. When I ordered it, everything was fine. After sitting to wait, I was then told by the girl that she can't do it iced and they only do traditional coffee there. She was pretty rude about it as well. I just asked for a cup of ice on the side and poured it in myself (after draining the water out of the cup of ice?), which I'm sure the barista could have done as well. Won't be returning here.

I have never been anywhere I couldn't get an iced espresso. When I ordered it, everything was fine. After sitting to wait, I was then told by the girl that she can't do it iced and they only do traditional coffee there. She was pretty rude about it as well. I just asked for a cup of ice on the side and poured it in myself (after draining the water out of the cup of ice?), which I'm sure the barista could have done as well. Won't be returning here.
It was granny weekend! So I visited my Nanuhbabee in Concord, NC, and took 4 other grans with us yo try a new place that we don't have in Ohio.

I come here all the time and they always give the same great service and food/coffee. Talk about consistency! They get very busy during weekends, so much so that they readjusted their layout to add more seating. It's the only local coffee shop in the immediate area.
Delicious !! First time visiting while here in Concord NC. The Maple Kronut and butter pecan ice was just what I needed. That Kronut was very delicious. Great desert spot and coffee/tea spot as well.

It was ok. I go to a coffee shop to sit down, relax and sip some coffee, but the atmosphere is kind of loud and uncomfortable. I also felt like I spent a lot of time doing work the staff usually does, It just doesn't feel very customer oriented. The food and just OK.

We are delighted to find a sweet place like this when we travel through Concord. We ordered some ice cream in cups, a Firecracker latte and a cranberry muffin. The ice cream favors are white chocolate raspberry and rocky road. They were rich and creamy. The latte is rich with dark chocolate flavor and an infusion of Cayenne pepper powder. The prices were reasonable. The service was attentive. We were satisfied customers and will come back when we pass through Concord in the future.

Beautiful ambiance. Their coffee flavors are interesting and tasty ..
overall a great coffee shop!
You have to go and see for yourself. It's a cafe at its finest.

I love stopping here if I have a minute. They have great coffee and wonderful little snacks and pastries! And the best part is they are incredibly fast. So if you're like me and are on the go and in need of something quick, they won't slow you down.
One of my favorite places to just get out of the office...

Authentic Coffee.  mouthwatering Desserts.  Reasonable Prices 

Without any doubt this is a cute little coffee spot to hang out. I feel some kind of a vibe with the ambience, especially with the wall art

It's a cute coffee shop, conveniently located  next to the Firestone where I get my car worked on. Great atmosphere for remote working while the car is in the shop.

Coffee is unfortunately a little inconsistent, and not nearly as strong as I would like. I notice this the most when I have an iced coffee. But coffee is a personal preference, so I wouldn't have my preference dissuade you from you coming in! Percantile is still one of my go to locations for meeting with friends and getting work done outside of the house because of its atmosphere and abundance of electrical outlets.
I had amazing berry latte  It was a good idea to order something different blew my mind

We love the Percantile! The coffee drinks are delicious as well as the teas. I've had a couple of the baked goods are they are always fabulous as well. We also always get such nice service. Highly reccommend!
Strawberry  ice Veeam was good
Great place for coffee and desserts.
Always have a great experience when I go.
